name: Yangtze
hint: The longest river in Asia, flowing through central China to the East China Sea

name: Yellow River
hint: China's second-longest river, often called the cradle of Chinese civilization

name: Ganges
hint: A sacred river in India flowing through the plains of northern India to the Bay of Bengal

name: Mekong
hint: A major river flowing through six countries in Southeast Asia, from the Tibetan Plateau to the South China Sea

name: Indus
hint: One of the longest rivers in Asia, flowing through Pakistan, the cradle of the Indus Valley Civilization

name: Brahmaputra
hint: A major river originating in Tibet, flowing through India and Bangladesh before joining the Ganges

name: Tigris
hint: One of two great rivers of Mesopotamia, flowing through Iraq alongside its twin

name: Euphrates
hint: The longest river in western Asia, historically defining the western border of Mesopotamia

name: Ob
hint: A major river in western Siberia, one of the longest in Russia, flowing north into the Arctic Ocean

name: Lena
hint: One of the longest rivers in the world, flowing through eastern Siberia to the Laptev Sea in the Arctic
